title: Retrieve History of a Self Assessment Charge
description: This endpoint enables you to retrieve the history of changes to a single charge made by HMRC. A National Insurance number and transaction ID must be provided.

chargeHistoryDetails.description: A list of changes to a particular charge

taxYear.description: The tax year that this charge relates to in the format: YYYY-YY.

transactionId.description: A unique identifier used to return a single charge. Must conform to the regular expression ^[A-Za-z0-9]{1,12}$

transactionDate.description: The date the charge was created in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

description.description: Primary method to identify what type of charge has been called.

totalAmount.description: The value of the charge following the change. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

changeDate.description: The date the charge was changed, in the format: YYYY-MM-DD. This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Use changeTimestamp instead.

changeTimestamp.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'ifs_hip_migration_1554_docs')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}The timestamp the charge was changed, in the format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

poaAdjustmentReason.description:
A numeric code indicating the reason for adjustment to Payments on Account. 

The possible values (with their meanings) are:

001: Profits for the business are down/the business has ceased

002: Other income has gone down

003: Tax Allowances and reliefs have gone up

004: Tax deducted at source is more than previous year

005: Increasing the PoA after a prior adjustment

For example: 004
